We, the good hard working law abiding citizens, request that the the entire benefits system is reviewed and changed so that it is only there for people that genuinely need and deserve it.

The initial request is that the existing benefits should only be made available to those that are law abiding.

We would suggest that instead of paying benefits in the form of money to criminals, they are provided with vouchers to a much lower value that can only be used in certain stores and against the cost of certain groceries (not alcoholic drinks or cigarettes) and provided with free tap water.

The law and punishment in this country is in an absolute mess and criminals are exploiting the governments weakness. It's high time the government starts listening to the people that pay their salary and keep them in power!!
